Gain @1Star@/@2Star@/@3Star@ placeable plants, based on Zyra's star level. Plants in the front two rows grow into durable Grasping Roots, while plants in the back two rows grow into Deadly Spines.

Rosemother plants benefit from Zyra's Ability Power and Attack Speed.

When Zyra casts, her plant restores @BonusHealthAndAS*100@% Health and gains @BonusHealthAndAS*100@% Attack Speed for the rest of combat. If the plant is dead, she revives it instead.

traits.desc: Abilities can Critically Strike. Every @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_CriticalThreat.1:Interval@ seconds, gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_CriticalThreat.1:CriticalStrikeChance@% Critical Strike Chance.

traits.desc: Ability damage <TFTKeyword>Stuns</TFTKeyword> for @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Demolitionist.1:StunDuration@ second.

traits.desc:
(@MinUnits@) Summon a storm that echoes @PercentDamageEcho*100@% of damage dealt as magic damage.
(@MinUnits@) Both champions contribute damage. The storm is bigger.

traits.desc: Gain Attack Speed equal to @PercentHealthAsAS*100@% maximum Health. Attacks grant @BonusMana@ bonus Mana.

traits.desc: Create a perfect copy of this champion with the same items equipped that deals @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_ShadowJutsu.1:DamagePercent*100@% damage.

traits.desc:
(@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_DreadNote.1:MinUnits@) If alive at @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_DreadNote.1:FirstDeath@ and @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_DreadNote.1:SecondDeath@ seconds, kill the enemy with the most Health
(@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_DreadNote.2:MinUnits@) At @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_DreadNote.2:FirstDeath@ and @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_DreadNote.2:SecondDeath@ seconds instead.

At @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Corrupted.1:HealthThreshold*100@% Health, awaken and blink toward enemies, stunning them for @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Corrupted.1:StunDuration@ seconds.

traits.desc: At combat start or when this activates gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_WarmingUp.1:Resists@ Armor and Magic Resistance. Every second, convert @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_WarmingUp.1:Conversion@ resists into @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_WarmingUp.1:Conversion@% Attack Damage. (Up to @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_WarmingUp.1:Resists@)

traits.desc: @Shred@% Shred and Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Take @DamageReduction@% less damage from Shredded or Sundered enemies.

(@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Thrillseeker.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Thrillseeker.2:AS*100@% %i:scaleAS% on kill. Execute enemies below @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Thrillseeker.2:ExecuteThreshold*100@% Health.

traits.desc: Become untargetable while @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Untouchable.1:NumAllies@+ allies are alive. (Current: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_Untouchable_DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%)

Current Bounty Card:
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_Trait_RogueCaptain_CurrentBounty@

This trait is active only when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Mentors.

(1) Allies gain the bonus
(4) Mentors gain all bonuses and upgrade their abilities. Other allies gain nothing.

Kobuko: @Durability*100@% Damage Reduction
Udyr: @ADAP*100@% Attack Damage and Ability Power
Yasuo: @AS*100@% Attack Speed
Ryze: Attacks grant @Mana@ bonus Mana

(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedPercent*100@% %i:scaleAS%

(@MinUnits@) @DamagePercent*100@% damage.

True Potential Unlocked: +@UltimateNumPotential@ %i:set14AmpIcon%

items.desc:
When Vi casts, Ekko releases 3 afterimages towards her target dealing @EkkoAfterImageReducedDamage*100@% damage. When Ekko casts, Vi slams an earthquake towards his target dealing @ViEarthquakeReducedDamage*100@% damage.

Gain a Vi and Ekko.

items.desc:
Gain a Bloodthirster. After you deal @PlayerDamage@ damage to other players, gain a Warwick and a Sterak's Gage.
(Current: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT13_Augment_WarwickDamageCount@)
items.name: What You Really Are

items.desc:
Gain an Adaptive Helm. After you upgrade @NumUpgrades@ champions, gain a Viktor and a Jeweled Gauntlet.
(Current: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT13_Augment_GrantViktor@)
items.name: Glorious Evolution

items.desc: When Sorcerers die, they deal @DeathPercentage*100@% of their Ability Power as magic damage to all adjacent units. Gain a Vladimir and Lux.
items.name: Arcane Retribution

items.desc: Gain a Sentinel Emblem and a Rell.
items.name: Sentinel Crest

items.desc: Gain 2 Rennis. Your strongest Renni's Ability costs @TOOLTIPManaReduction@ less and causes her to lunge towards the farthest enemy within @TOOLTIPHexDistance@ hexes, dealing @TOOLTIPAbilityDamage*100@% damage to the target and reduced damage to enemies in her path.
items.name: Brutal Revenge

items.desc: Gain a Vander. Your strongest Vander gains a brand new Ability that no longer grants resistances, but deals @TOOLTIPBonusDamage*100@% increased damage and punches the target backwards, dealing @TOOLTIPONLYSplashPerc*100@% of the original damage to all enemies hit.
items.name: Gloves Off

items.desc: Gain a Rebel Emblem and an Akali.
items.name: Rebel Crest

items.desc: Experiments gain @Health*100@% Health and grant a special hex. The Experiment in the hex is killed on combat start, granting their Experiment bonus to other laboratory hexes. Gain 3 Experiment champions.
items.name: The Mutation Survives

items.desc: Conquerors execute enemies below @BaseExecuteThreshold@% Health. When they do, they gain @ArmorandMagicResist@ Armor and Magic Resist for the rest of combat. Gain a Darius and Draven.
items.name: Noxian Guillotine

items.desc: Gain an Academy Emblem and a random sponsored item.
items.name: Academy Crown

items.desc: Gain a Watcher Emblem, a Steadfast Heart, and a Scar.
items.name: Watcher Crown

items.desc: Combat start and every @TimeBetweenProcs@ seconds, all Quickstrikers attack @AttackSpeed*100@% faster for @BuffDuration@ seconds. Gain a Nocturne and Akali.
items.name: Adrenaline Burst

items.desc: While you field 2 of the same Form Swapper in different forms, both gain @BonusStats@ Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist, and @BonusStats@% Attack Damage. When you 3-star a Form Swapper, gain a 2-star copy. Gain a Swain and Gangplank.
items.name: Why Not Both?

items.desc: Gain an Enforcer Emblem.
items.name: Enforcer Crest

items.desc:
Every @NumScrapItemsConverted@ components Scrap champions convert, gain a random component (max @MaxComponents@). Gain a Powder and a Trundle.

Converted: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT13_Augment_Scrap_NumComponents@/@NumScrapItemsConverted@
items.name: Top of the Scrap Heap

items.desc: Gain a Family Emblem.
items.name: Family Crest

items.desc: Gain an Ambusher Emblem and a Camille.
items.name: Ambusher Crest

items.desc: Gain a Quickstriker Emblem and an Akali.
items.name: Quickstriker Crest

items.desc: If at least @MinNumFamilyMembers@ Family members are alive after @TimeRequirement@ seconds in combat or at the end of combat, gain a random copy of a Vander, Powder, or Violet. Gain a Powder and Violet.
items.name: Welcome to the Playground

items.desc: Gain a Dominator Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Blitzcrank.
items.name: Dominator Crown

items.desc: Everytime you choose to save your Shimmer on a Black Market, heal @Heal@ player health and gain @Gold@ gold. Gain a Renni.
items.name: War for the Undercity

items.desc: Gain a Rebel Emblem, a Jeweled Gauntlet, and an Akali.
items.name: Rebel Crown

items.desc: Gain a Visionary Emblem and a Renata Glasc.

items.desc: Gain a Steb. Your strongest Steb's Ability's Mana cost is reduced by @ManaReduction@, but no longer heals. Steb's spell grants @TOOLTIPONLYOmnivamp@% Omnivamp and strikes 3 times, each dealing @TOOLTIPONLYModifiedDamage*100@%.
items.name: Combat Medic

items.desc:
Gain a Blue Buff. After starting a round with @RoundGold@ gold and winning a player combat, gain a Mel and a Hextech Gunblade.

Tasks can be completed in any order.
items.name: A Change Of Fate

items.desc: Artillerist rockets deal @IncreasedRocketDamage*100@% increased damage. Every @RocketDamageThreshold@ rockets your Artillerists fire, gain a Collector (max @MaxItems@). Gain a Tristana and Urgot. (Rockets Fired: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT13_Augment_Artillerist_TotalDamage@)

items.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem and a Sett.

items.desc: Gain a Sorcerer Emblem and a Vladimir.

items.desc: Gain a Pit Fighter Emblem and an Urgot.

items.desc: Gain a Conqueror Emblem and a Rell.

items.desc: Gain a Trundle. Your strongest Trundle's Ability no longer heals, but grants him @TOOLTIPONLYAS@% Attack Speed for @TOOLTIPONLYDuration@ seconds, and permanently grants him @TOOLTIPONLYADPerCast@% Attack Damage. His maximum mana is reduced by @ManaReduction@.
items.name: Trolling

items.desc: Gain an Ambusher Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Camille.
items.name: Ambusher Crown

items.desc:
While fielded with Silco, Powder gains Dominator, but no longer benefits from Family. When her monkey explodes, it creates @TOOLTIPONLYNumMonstrosities@ of Silco's monstrosities.

Gain a 2-star Powder and a Silco.

items.desc: Gain @FreeAnomalyRerolls@ free Anomaly rerolls. Unused rerolls are converted to gold. Gain @InitialGold@ gold now.

items.desc: Pit Fighters permanently gain @ADPerLoss*100@% Attack Damage if they lost the last combat. If they won, gain @HealthPerWin@ Health instead. Gain an Urgot.

items.desc: Gain a Chem-Baron Emblem, a Nashor's Tooth, and a Smeech.
items.name: Chem-Baron Crown

items.desc: Gain an Irelia. Your strongest Irelia gains @TOOLTIPBonusAS*100@% Attack Speed and gains a brand new Ability that dashes her between two targets, dealing physical damage to both.
items.name: Blade Dance

items.desc:
When Ambessa casts, Caitlyn fires an empowered attack at the target, dealing @TOOLTIPONLYCAITAD@% damage. Ambessa gains @TOOLTIPONLYADSHARE@% of Caitlyn's Attack Damage.

Gain a Caitlyn and Ambessa.
items.name: Trait: Martial Law

items.desc: Gain a Sentinel Emblem, a Crownguard, and a Loris.
items.name: Sentinel Crown

items.desc: Gain a 2-star Blitzcrank. Your strongest Blitzcrank becomes supercharged, dealing magic damage to 2 nearby enemies every @TooltipDuration@ seconds and on every Ability cast.

items.desc: Your Preservers gain both Mana and Health restoration from the trait. Preservers gain @BonusDamage*100@% Damage Amp. Gain a Bard and a Zilean.

Dragons gain @Health*100@% Health and @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed. After Dragons score @TakedownThreshold@ champion takedowns, gain a Smolder. Gain a Nomsy and a Shyvana.

items.desc: Honeymancers gain @BonusBees@ more Bee. When Bees jump to a new Honeymancer, the Honeymancer gains a @MaxHealthPct*100@% max Health Shield. Gain a Blitzcrank and a Kog'Maw.

Sugarcrafters gain @HealthPer@ Health and @GoldChancePer*100@% chance to drop 1 gold on kill for each component they hold. Gain a Soraka and a Rumble.

Artifact, Support, and Radiant items count as 2 components.

items.desc: After casting an Ability, Chronomancers gain @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed and @Omnivamp*100@% Omnivamp for @Duration@ seconds. Gain a Jax and a Zilean.

items.desc: The Eldritch summon holds a beneficial item. The summon gains bonus @HealthPct*100@% Health and @AbilityPower@ Ability Power. Gain an Elise and a Syndra.

items.desc: Combat start: Your strongest Bastion gains @Health*100@% Health. When other units die, they transfer @DefenseRatio*100@% of their Armor and Magic Resist to it. Gain a Poppy and a Nunu.

items.desc: Enemies hit by Incantor Abilities deal @DamageReduction*100@% less damage for @Duration@ seconds. At max stacks, Incantors gain @ManaPerSecond@ Mana every @ManaDuration@ seconds. Gain a Ziggs and a Syndra.

items.desc: Gain 2 Wukongs. Your strongest Wukong's Ability scales with Attack Damage instead of resists. After each cast, Wukong gains stacking @TOOLTIPADPerCast@% Attack Damage and @TOOLTIPASPerCast@% Attack Speed.

items.desc: Gain a Honeymancy emblem.
items.name: Honeymancy Crest

items.desc: Gain a 2-star Elise. Your strongest Elise's Ability no longer Stuns, but poisons her target and the 2 closest enemies with @TOOLTIPBonusDamage@% damage over @TOOLTIPBleedDuration@ seconds.

items.desc: Gain a Vanguard emblem and a Rumble.

items.desc: Gain a Warrior emblem and an Akali.

items.desc:
Start of Combat: Gain @CombatStartMana@ Mana.

Lifeline: At @HealthThreshold@% Health, gain @TriggerMana@ Mana and a Shield equal to @ShieldHealthPercent@% max Health.
items.name: Protector's Vow

items.desc:
Gain bonuses for starring Punk champions.
2-star: Gain @Gold@ gold
3-star: Gain @numcomponents@ component
items.name: Extended Play

items.desc: Crowd Divers gain @as*100@% Attack Speed and leap at @health*100@% Health instead of on death. Gain 2 Crowd Divers.
items.name: Party Starters

items.desc: The damage over time effect from your Dazzlers lasts @duration@ seconds longer and deals @damageamp@% more damage. Gain a Nami and a Bard.
items.name: The Ol' Razzle Dazzle

items.desc: @Delay@ seconds into combat, all enemies and non-KDA units are stunned and forced to dance for @StunDuration@ seconds. Your KDA champions gain @BonusAP@ Ability Power. Gain a Lillia and a Kai'Sa.
items.name: Mesmerizing Performance

items.desc: After their first sampled cast, EDM champions will sample @newfrequency*100@% more frequently. Gain a Lux.
items.name: The Drop

items.desc: Edgelords' attacks deal @cleave*10@% of their damage to enemies within @HexRange@ hexes of their target. Gain a Yasuo and a Kayle.
items.name: Live for Danger

items.desc:
Gain a Bard. Combat start: Jazz champions gain permanent bonuses based on the number of active traits.
@firstBreakpoint@: @Health@ max Health
@secondBreakpoint@: and @AS@% Attack Speed
@thirdBreakpoint@: and @ad@% Attack Damage and @ap@ Ability Power
items.name: That's Jazz, Baby!

items.desc: Crowd Divers gain @Stats@ Armor, @Stats@ Magic Resist, @Stats@ Ability Power, @Stats@% Attack Damage and @Stats@% Attack Speed for each adjacent enemy. Gain an Evelynn and a Katarina.
items.name: Give Me Your Energy!

items.desc: When you have @NumUpgrades@ 3-star Punks, gain a Yorick and a Bloodthirster. Punks gain @BonusDmgAmp*100@% Damage Amp for each Pentakill champion fielded. Gain a Gnar and a Twitch.
items.name: The Band Is All Here

items.desc: Every @BonusAttackThreshold@ attacks, Big Shots also fire a bomb that deals @ADPercent*100@% Attack Damage to enemies within 1 hex of the target. Gain a Kai'Sa.
items.name: Bigger Shot

items.desc: Allies of your Emo champions gain @percenteffect*100@% of the Emo Mana bonus when any ally dies. Gain an Annie and a Vex.
items.name: Emotional Connection

items.desc: Sentinels gain @PercGain*100@% bonus Armor and Magic Resist. Every @Interval@ seconds, their next attack deals @ResistToDamageRatio*100@% of their total resistances as magic damage. Gain a Garen.
items.name: Shield Bash

items.desc:
Your 8-Bit champions execute targets below @ExecuteThreshold*100@% Health. Executions have a @BaseDropChance@% chance to drop @Gold@ gold, increased by @LevelScalar@% for each high score achieved. Gain a Corki and a Garen.

Current drop chance: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT10_Augment_InsertCoin_GoldChance@%
items.name: Insert Coin

items.desc: The first time your Headliner dies, they become invulnerable and heal @Heal*100@% of their max Health over @repairtime@ seconds instead.
items.name: Encore!

items.desc:
Damage from Executioners' attacks and spells Shred and Sunder enemies by @ShredSunder@% for @Duration@ seconds. Gain a Twitch.

(Shred: reduce Magic Resist, Sunder: reduce Armor)
items.name: Expose Weakness

items.desc: K/DA champions gain @BonusAP@ Ability Power. @Delay@ seconds into combat, all enemies and non-K/DA units are forced to dance for @StunDuration@ seconds. Gain a Lillia and a Kai'Sa.
items.name: Mesmerizing Performance

items.desc: K/DA champions gain @BonusAP@ Ability Power. @Delay@ seconds into combat, all enemies and non-K/DA units are forced to dance for @StunDuration@ seconds. Gain a Lillia and a Kai'Sa.
items.name: Mesmerizing Performance

items.desc: Keep @percent*100@% of the Heartsteel hearts you convert into rewards. Your Heartsteel champions gain @Health@ Health. Gain a K'Sante and an Aphelios.
items.name: Heartthrobs

items.desc: Your Headliner's damage heals your Superfans for @HealPercent*100@% of the damage dealt. Gain a Gnar.
items.name: Do It for the Fans

items.desc: Enemies that attack a Guardian's shield take magic damage equal to @HealthPercent@% of the shielded unit's max Health (up to once per second). Gain a Pantheon.
items.name: Heroic Presence

items.desc: Allies sharing a trait with your Headliner gain @health@ Health and @as@% Attack Speed.
items.name: Remember Your Roots

items.desc: Enemies your Edgelords dash through become Mana-Reaved, Chilled, and Wounded for @duration@ seconds. Gain a Yasuo and a Kayle.
items.name: Cold Steel

items.desc: The first time Akali casts, K/DA and True Damage champions gain @BonusRatio*100@% of the other's bonus. Gain an Akali.
items.name: Rap Queen

items.desc: Rapidfire champions start combat with @StartingStacks@ stacks of Attack Speed from their trait, and can now go up to @NewMaxStacks@ stacks. Gain a Jinx and a Senna.
items.name: Ramping Rhythm

items.desc: EDM's sampled champion gains @mana@ Mana every @interval@ seconds. When they cast, they gain @ap@% Attack Damage and @ap@ Ability Power for the rest of combat. Gain a Jax and a Lux.
items.name: Sample Synthesis

items.desc: When your Spellweavers cast their 2nd Ability each combat, they instantly cast it again at @DamagePercent*100@% effectiveness. Gain a Gragas and a Seraphine.
items.name: Raise the Tempo

items.desc: Country champions have a @GoldChance@% chance to drop @BonusKillGold@ gold on kill. Your Dreadsteed's chances are doubled. Gain a Samira.
items.name: Bounty Hunters

items.desc: Create a clone of your Headliner with @MinBonusTOOLTIPONLY*100@% -@MaxBonusTOOLTIPONLY*100@% of their base health (based on stage level). You cannot equip items on the clone.
items.name: Hologram

items.desc: Your True Damage champions gain @health@ Health and @attackspeed*100@% Attack Speed for each item they are holding. Gain a Yasuo and a Senna.
items.name: Blinged Out

items.desc: Disco Balls cast the selected EDM champion's Ability at @DiscoEffectiveness*100@% effectiveness.  Gain a Jax and a Nami.
items.name: Rave Festival

items.desc: All of your champions gain their unique Headliner effect. In Addition, your Headliner gains @HLHealth@ Health and @HLAttackspeed*100@% Attack Speed.
items.name: Talent Search

items.desc: Combat Start: For each adjacent ally, Moshers gain @Stats@ Armor, @Stats@ Magic Resist, @Stats@ Attack Damage, @Stats@ Ability Power, and @Stats@% Attack Speed. Gain a Jax and a Gnar.
items.name: Submit to the Pit

items.desc: On death, Bruisers deal @ExplosionMaxHealthPercent@% of their max Health to enemies within @Hex@ hex. After @TimeInCombat@ seconds, expand the range to @ImprovedHex@ hexes. Gain an Olaf and a Gragas.
items.name: Too Big to Fail

items.desc: Heartsteel Champions gain @BonusAD*100@% Attack Damage for each 8-bit champion fielded. Whenever you beat a high score, gain @BonusHearts@ Hearts multiplied by the number of times it's been beaten. Gain an Aphelios and a Garen.
items.name: Retro Gamers

items.desc: Your Disco Balls affect allies up to @DiscoRadius@ hexes away and pulse every @newtickrate@ seconds. Gain a Nami and a Gragas.
items.name: Double the Funk

items.desc: Your Pentakill champions are immune to crowd control for the first @immuneduration@ seconds of combat. They heal @heal*100@% of their max Health on takedown. Gain a Kayle and a Gnar.

[KAYN CONSUMABLE - This item disappears when used and DESTROYS Rhaast's Embrace]

[Can only be used during the Planning Phase]

items.name: Hullcrusher

items.name: tft_item_name_Hush

Combat start: Shoot a beam that @CostIncrease@% Mana Reaves enemies.

Your team gains @BonusAllyHealth@ Health.

[Support item] [Unique - only 1 per champion]
Mana Reave: increase maximum Mana until the next cast
@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT_BindOnEquipTRA@

Turns all items on a champion into shadow items when used.

[CONSUMABLE - This item disappears when used.]
This Item cannot transform Force of Nature, which is above corruption.
items.name: Shadow Transformer

items.desc: At @DelayTime@ seconds, The Annihilator deals percent max Health true damage once.
items.name: The Annihilator

items.desc: Every @CastPeriod@ seconds, a random Anima Squad champion fires Gatling Bunny-Guns in a long cone, dealing high physical damage.
items.name: Gatling Bunny-Guns

items.desc: Every @CastPeriod@ seconds, a random Anima Squad champion spawns a whirl of Tornadoes, dealing magic damage.
items.name: Tornadoes

items.desc: Every @CastPeriod@ seconds, a random Anima Squad champion fires Searing Shortbow, shooting an arrow that leaves an area that deals magic damage over time.
items.name: Searing Shortbow

items.desc: Every @CastPeriod@ seconds, a random Anima Squad champion fires piercing orbs from Vortex Glove, that deal magic damage, reduced for each enemy struck.
items.name: Vortex Glove

items.desc: Every @CastPeriod@ seconds, a random Anima Squad champion throws three Ani-Mines that explode, dealing physical damage in an area.
items.name: Ani-Mines

items.desc: Every @CastPeriod@ seconds, a random Anima Squad champion rapidfires UwU Blasters, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit.
items.name: UwU Blasters

items.desc: Every @CastPeriod@ seconds, a random Anima Squad champion casts Guiding Hex, dealing magic damage to 3 random nearby targets.
items.name: Guiding Hex

items.desc: Every @CastPeriod@ seconds, a random Anima Squad champion throws a returning Blade-o-rang that deals physical damage, increased for the first target hit.
items.name: Blade-o-rang

items.desc: Every few seconds, Final City Transit summons trains that run through the battlefield, dealing devastating damage and carrying away low health enemies.
items.name: Final City Transit

items.desc: Every @Period@ seconds, Supply Drop calls in a support ship that drops powerful goodies onto the battlefield.
items.name: Surprise Supply Drop

items.desc:
Execute enemies below @ExecuteThresholdPercent*100@% Health. Abilities can critically strike. Gain @RedundantCritDamage*100@% Critical Strike Damage.

Total Executions This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_JhinItem_TotalExecutions@

Recommended users: Jhin and Zeri
items.name: Pulse Silencer

items.desc:
All Shields are @ShieldEffectivenessPercent*100@% more effective on the holder. Every @SiphonFrequency@ seconds, siphon @HealthSiphonAmt*100@% of the owner's max Health from the current target and convert it to a Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

Shielding This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_MordekaiserItem_TotalShielding@

Recommended users: Mordekaiser, Jax, and Sejuani
items.name: Corrupted Chassis

items.desc:
Attacks that Critically Strike grant @BonusManaOnHit@ bonus Mana. After casting an Ability, gain @CritChanceOnCast@% Critical Strike Chance for @Duration@ seconds.

Recommended users: Varus, Jhin, and Zeri
items.name: Holobow

items.desc:
Abilities and Attacks mark enemies for @MarkDuration@ seconds. Heal for @HealingPercent*100@% of damage dealt to marked enemies.

Total Healing This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_SejuaniItem_TotalHealing@

Recommended users: Sejuani, Jax, and Mordekaiser
items.name: Cybercoil

items.desc:
Attacks that Critically Strike grant @BonusManaOnHit@ bonus Mana. After casting an Ability, gain @CritChanceOnCast@% Critical Strike Chance for @Duration@ seconds.

Recommended users: Varus, Jhin, and Zeri
items.name: Scoped Holobow

items.desc:
When you damage an enemy, deal @StoredDamage*100@% of the damage to the nearest enemy as physical damage after a brief delay.

Total Shockwave Damage This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_NaafiriItem_TotalShockwaveDamage@

Recommended users: Naafiri, Jhin, and Varus
items.name: Apex-Fangs

items.desc:
Execute enemies below @ExecuteThresholdPercent*100@% Health. Abilities can critically strike. If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain @RedundantCritDamage*100@% Critical Strike Damage instead.

Total Executions This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_JhinItem_TotalExecutions@

Recommended users: Jhin and Zeri
items.name: Pulse Stabilizer

items.desc:
Attacks store charge. At @ChargeCap@ charges, the next attack consumes the charges to deal @ShockDamage*100@% of the target's max health as physical damage and reduces their Armor by @FlatArmorReduction@.

Total Charge Damage This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_ZeriItem_TotalLightningDamage@

Recommended users: Zeri and Naafiri
items.name: Flux Capacitor

items.desc:
Gain @BonusPercentHP*100@% health. Every @Interval@ seconds, deal @PercHealthDamage*100@% of the holder's max health as magic damage to all enemies within @Radius@-hex.

Total Damage Dealt This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_JaxItem_TotalDamageReflected@

Recommended users: Jax, Mordekaiser, and Sejuani
items.name: Repulsor Lantern

items.desc:
Abilities and Attacks mark enemies for @MarkDuration@ seconds. Heal for @HealingPercent*100@% of damage dealt to marked enemies.

Total Healing This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_SejuaniItem_TotalHealing@

Recommended users: Sejuani, Jax, and Mordekaiser
items.name: Hijacked Cybercoil

items.desc:
Every other attack is charged, dealing @ShockDamage*100@% of the target's max health as physical damage and reduces their Armor by @FlatArmorReduction@.

Total Charge Damage This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_ZeriItem_TotalLightningDamage@

Recommended users: Zeri and Naafiri
items.name: Fully-Charged Flux Capacitor

items.desc:
Gain @BonusPercentHP*100@% health. Every @Interval@ seconds, deal @PercHealthDamage*100@% of the holder's max health as magic damage to all enemies within @Radius@-hex.

Total Damage Dealt This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_JaxItem_TotalDamageReflected@

Recommended users: Jax, Mordekaiser, and Sejuani
items.name: Nullifier Lantern

items.desc:
All Shields are @ShieldEffectivenessPercent*100@% more effective on the holder. Every second, siphon @HealthSiphonAmt*100@% of the owner's max Health from the nearest @NumEnemies@ enemies and convert it to a Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

Shielding This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_MordekaiserItem_TotalShielding@

Recommended users: Mordekaiser, Jax, and Sejuani
items.name: Harmonized Chassis

items.desc:
When you damage an enemy, store @StoredDamage*100@% of your damage dealt to them. After @MarkDuration@ seconds, deal the stored damage to the target and the nearest enemy as physical damage.

Total Shockwave Damage This Round: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Trait_Cybernetic_NaafiriItem_TotalShockwaveDamage@

Recommended users: Naafiri, Jhin, and Varus
items.name: Hyper Fangs

items.desc:
Use this on an Arcana champion to change Arcana's effect to theirs.

Ahri: Gain Ability Power for each 3-star champion.
Hecarim: Units holding items gain Damage Reduction and Attack Damage.
Tahm Kench: Gain Health for each active trait.
Xerath: Abilities deal bonus true damage for each Charm purchased.
Emblem: Gain Damage Amp for each Spatula item equipped.
items.name: Arcana Signifier

items.desc:
After dealing damage @MaxNumStacks@ times, gain @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT12_Faerie_DamageAmp@% %i:scaleDA% for the rest of combat.

After dealing damage @RadiantMaxStacks@ times, gain @RadiantMaxHealth*100@% maximum Health, @RadiantOmnivamp*100@% Omnivamp, and @RadiantDamageAmp*100@% damage amp.

Only Faeries can hold this item.
Bench the champion to remove it.
items.name: Eternal Monarch's Crown

items.desc:
After dealing damage @MaxNumStacks@ times, gain @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT12_Faerie_DamageAmp@% %i:scaleDA% for the rest of combat.

Only Faeries can hold this item.
Bench the champion to remove it.
items.name: Faerie Queen's Crown

items.desc: The holder of this item is stunned. This effect ends when they die.
items.name: Cursed Quicksilver

items.desc:
Use this on a Briar to grant her @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT12_BoundHealthGain@ %i:scaleHealth% in exchange for @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT12_BoundHealthCost@ of your player health.

In Choncc's Treasure, this item is improved at Stage 3-1 and 4-1.

[Consumable - This item disappears when used.]
items.name: A Light Snack

items.desc: The holder of this item sets their attack speed cap to @ASCap@ and cannot gain mana or cast. Every time they are attacked, the attacker gains <TFTBonus>@BonusAttackSpeed*100@%</TFTBonus> Attack Speed.
items.name: Cursed Guinsoo's Rageblade

items.desc: The holder deals @NegativeDamageAmp*100@% less damage. They also take @DamageRatio*100@% of their max health as true damage per second, and heal Milio for the same amount.
items.name: Cursed Hextech Gunblade

items.desc:
Gain @HealShieldPower*100@% increased healing and shielding. Heal for @QueenHealRatio*100@% of the Queen's damage dealt.

Only Faeries can hold this item.
Bench the champion to remove it.
items.name: Queenguard's Armor

items.desc:
Gain @HealShieldPower*100@% increased healing and shielding. Heal for @QueenHealRatio*100@% of the Queen's damage dealt.

Only Faeries can hold this item.
Bench the champion to remove it.
items.name: Armor of Eternal Devotion

items.desc:
Wounded allies gain @WoundDamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%.

Allies that start combat in the back @NumRow@ rows @ArmorReduction*100@% Sunder enemies for @Duration@ seconds when dealing physical damage.

Sunder: Reduce Armor
items.name: Shatter Sweep

items.desc: This champion is <TFTKeyword>Untargetable</TFTKeyword> while at least @NumAlliesAlive@ allies are alive (does not include the holder).

items.desc:

items.name: Use your Power Snax on a champion to unlock Power Ups.

items.name: TFT15_HiddenTech_SoulOfAStarGuardian_Name

items.desc:

items.desc:
This champion receives a penalty for @NumRounds@ rounds losing -@DamagePenalty*100@% %i:scaleDA% and -@DurabilityPenalty*100@% %i:scaleDR% and capping their Attack Speed to @ASCapPenality@.

After @NumRounds@ rounds, remove the penalty and instead gain @ASReward*100@% %i:scaleAS% and @DamageReward*100@% %i:scaleDA%.

Rounds are tracked per Champion.

items.desc:
Your team heals a percentage of their max Health every @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mascot.1:Seconds@ seconds.

When a champion dies, they retreat to the sidelines to cheer on your team. Your team's healing increases for each cheering champion.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mascot.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mascot.1:BaseHealthRegen@% %i:scaleHealth% base, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mascot.1:HealthRegenPerMascot@% %i:scaleHealth% per cheering champion
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mascot.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mascot.2:BaseHealthRegen@% %i:scaleHealth% base, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mascot.2:HealthRegenPerMascot@% %i:scaleHealth% per cheering champion
items.name: Mascot

items.desc: Every @Duration@ seconds, revive the strongest ally that hasn't been revived yet at @HPPercent*100@% of their maximum Health.
items.name: Tome of Mending

items.desc:
After @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.1:FirstDelay@ seconds of combat, the Dragon strikes the board, dealing true damage and stunning all enemies. Allies gain Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.1:TrueDamageHPRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth% damage, Stuns for @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.1:StunDuration@ seconds, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.1:AttackSpeedBuff*100@% %i:scaleAS%.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.2:TrueDamageHPRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth% damage, Stuns for @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.2:StunDuration@ seconds, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.2:AttackSpeedBuff*100@% %i:scaleAS%.
After an additional @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Dragonlord.2:SecondDelay@ seconds, the Dragon strikes again.
items.name: Dragonlord

items.desc:
Gain a spotlight hex.
Combat start: the unit standing in the spotlight gains bonus stats.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Socialite.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Socialite.1:DamagePercent*100@% %i:scaleDA% and @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Socialite.1:ManaPerSecond@ %i:scaleMana% per second.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Socialite.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Socialite.2:DamagePercent*100@% %i:scaleDA%, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Socialite.2:ManaPerSecond@ %i:scaleMana% per second, and @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Socialite.2:OmnivampPercent*100@% %i:scaleSV%. Gain another spotlight hex.
items.name: Socialite

items.desc: Kayle deals @DamageAmpPercent*100@% more damage. When she casts, she fires two waves.
items.name: Tome of Power

items.desc: Kayle deals @DamageAmpPercent*100@% more damage. Her attacks now hit in a @HexRadius@-hex radius around the target
items.name: Tome of Swiftness

items.desc:
Gain 2 Mountain hexes in the front row.
Combat start: units standing on a Mountain hex gain a Shield and permanent bonus Health.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mountain.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mountain.1:ShieldValue@ Shield, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mountain.1:PermBonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mountain.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mountain.2:ShieldValue@ Shield, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Mountain.2:PermBonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%. The entire front row becomes Mountain hexes.
items.name: Mountain

items.desc:
Gain Shimmerscale items. These items give gold as well as combat power.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shimmerscale.1:MinUnits@)Gain Goldmancers Staff. At Stage @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shimmerscale.1:SecondItemStage@-@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shimmerscale.1:SecondItemRound@ gain Draven's Axe.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shimmerscale.2:MinUnits@)Gain Crown of Champions.
items.name: Shimmerscale

items.desc:
Your team's takedowns grant stacks of Conquest. After gaining enough Conquest, open War Chests full of loot!

Your team gains Attack Damage and Ability Power, increased by @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror:PercentIncreasePerChest*100@% for each War Chest opened.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror.1:ADAPBase*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%; @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror.1:StacksPerKill@x Conquest
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror.2:ADAPBase*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%; @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror.2:StacksPerKill@x Conquest

War Chests Opened: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror_ChestsCompleted@
Current Stats: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_Conqueror_CurrentADAP@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
items.name: Conqueror

items.desc:
Your team gain bonus Health, Attack Damage and Ability Power, which increases by 1% every time you spend gold on a Shop reroll.

After each combat, gain a 1 gold reroll for that round. Your first reroll each round grants @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Punk:FIRST_ROLL_BONUS@% bonus instead!

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Punk.1:MinUnits@ )@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Punk.1:BONUS_HEALTH@ %i:scaleHealth% and @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Punk.1:BONUS_AD_AP*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Punk.2:MinUnits@ )@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Punk.2:BONUS_HEALTH@ %i:scaleHealth% and @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Punk.2:BONUS_AD_AP*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%

Current Bonus: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_Punk_CurrentBonus@%
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_Punk_CurrentHealthBonus@ %i:scaleHealth% and @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_Punk_CurrentADBonus@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
items.name: Punk

items.desc:
Summon a Hero named Kayle and evolve her as you level up!

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver.1:MinUnits@) When you reach level @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver:FirstArmoryLevel@, Kayle upgrades to 2-star. Pick a supportive effect.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver.2:MinUnits@) Kayle evolves again at levels @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver:SecondArmoryLevel@, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver:ThirdArmoryLevel@ and @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver:FourStarUpgradeLevel@:
Level @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver:SecondArmoryLevel@: Pick a combat effect.
Level @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver:ThirdArmoryLevel@: Kayle upgrades to 3-star. Pick a combat effect.
Level @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Storyweaver:FourStarUpgradeLevel@: Kayle upgrades to 4-star.
items.name: Storyweaver

items.desc:
Gain a Glacial Mallet. Attacks from champions holding a mallet have a @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Glacial.1:ProcPercent*100@% chance to stun their target for @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Glacial.1:StunDuration@ second and deal bonus magic damage.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Glacial.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Glacial.1:BonusDamage@ magic damage.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Glacial.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Glacial.2:BonusDamage@ magic damage. Gain another Glacial Mallet.
items.name: Glacial

items.desc:
Use the Pilot Selector to choose a Pilot. Combat start: the Pilot jumps into a Mech.

The Mech has the Traits and items of its Pilot, and gains a percent of the pilot's Attack Damage and max Health. When the Mech dies, the Pilot(s) are ejected with @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_MechPilot.1:EjectedPilotHealthPercent@% of their max Health.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_MechPilot.1:MinUnits@) Mini-Mech: @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_MechPilot.1:MechCombinedADRatio*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleHealth%
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_MechPilot.2:MinUnits@) Super-Mech: @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_MechPilot.2:MechCombinedADRatio*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleHealth%. The 2 nearest units to the Pilot also jump into the Mech.
items.name: Mech-Pilot

items.desc:
Your team gains @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Pyro:BaseASPct@% %i:scaleAS% Attack Speed.

For each kill, your team creates an infernal cinder that you collect the next round. For every @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Pyro:NumCinders@ cinders you collect, your team gains @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Pyro:ASPctPerNumCinders@% more %i:scaleAS%.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Pyro.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Pyro.1:NumCindersPerKill@ infernal cinder per enemy.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Pyro.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Pyro.2:NumCindersPerKill@ infernal cinders per enemy and execute enemies under @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Pyro.2:ExecutePct@% Health.

Cinders collected: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_PyroCindersCollected@
Team %i:scaleAS%: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_PyroAttackSpeed@%
items.name: Pyro

items.desc:
For each active trait, your team gains bonus Health and Damage Amp.
(Excludes unique and Anniversary Traits)

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Jazz.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Jazz.1:BonusHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Jazz.1:BonusDamage*100@% %i:scaleDA%
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Jazz.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Jazz.2:BonusHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Jazz.2:BonusDamage*100@% %i:scaleDA%

Bonus Health: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT10_Trait_Jazz_TraitTracker_CurrentBonus@%
Bonus Damage Amp: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT10_Trait_Jazz_TraitTracker_CurrentBonus_Damage@%
items.name: Jazz

items.desc:
Your team gains a Shield and Damage Amp for each adjacent ally.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Rebel.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Rebel.1:ShieldAmount@ Shield for @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Rebel.1:ShieldDuration@ seconds, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Rebel.1:DamageAmp@% %i:scaleDA%
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Rebel.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Rebel.2:ShieldAmount@ Shield for @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Rebel.2:ShieldDuration@ seconds, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Rebel.2:DamageAmp@% %i:scaleDA%
items.name: Rebel

items.desc: Grant Kayle and adjacent allies in the same row @APAmt@ Ability Power at the start of combat.
items.name: Talisman of Might

items.desc: Grant Kayle and adjacent allies in the same row @ASAmt*100@% Attack Speed at the start of combat.
items.name: Talisman of Speed

items.desc:
Use this on a champion to make it the Pilot of the Mech.

[Cannot be used on champions in combat.]
[Unlimited uses]
items.name: Pilot Selector

items.desc:
At the times shown in the High Roller trait, roll a random Jinx mod:
- Rocket: Launch @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller_NumRockets@ rockets at random enemies, dealing
@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller.1:Spell1RocketADScalar*100@% Attack Damage + @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller.1:Spell1RocketAPScalar*100@% Ability Power physical damage per rocket.
- Shield: Gain a @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller_ShieldFlatAmount@ + @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller_ShieldMaxHPPercentage@% max Health Shield for @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller.1:Spell2ShieldDuration@ seconds.
- Gold: Gain @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller_GoldAmount@ gold.
items.name: Sevika's Jinxed Arm

items.desc:
Grant %i:scaleAP% @AbilityPowerPerGold@ Ability Power per %i:goldCoins% gold in your bank (up to %i:goldCoins% @AbilityPowerGoldMax@ gold) and a @OnKillProcChance*100@% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% @OnKillProcGold@ gold on enemy kill.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Gold generated this game: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Item_GoldGenerated@
items.name: Goldmancer's Staff

items.desc:
Every @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Elderwood.1:TickRate@ seconds your team grows, gaining bonus stats. This effect stacks up to @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Elderwood.1:MaxStacks@ times.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Elderwood.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Elderwood.1:BonusResists@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Elderwood.1:BonusADSP@ %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Elderwood.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Elderwood.2:BonusResists@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Elderwood.2:BonusADSP@ %i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAD%
items.name: Elderwood

items.desc:
Attacks have a @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFTEvent5YR_Glacial_StunChance@% chance to stun enemies for @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Glacial.1:StunDuration@ second and deal @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFTEvent5YR_Glacial_BonusDamage@ bonus magic damage.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
items.name: Glacial Mallet

items.desc:
Gain Boss Knuckles. When the holder first drops below @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Boss.1:HealthThreshold*100@% Health, they become The Boss and leave combat to start doing sit-ups. Each sit-up restores maximum Health and grants Attack Speed.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Boss.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Boss.1:HealPercent*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Boss.1:AttackSpeedPercent*100@% %i:scaleAS%.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Boss.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Boss.2:HealPercent*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Boss.2:AttackSpeedPercent*100@% %i:scaleAS%. If they reach full Health they return to combat Pumped Up: all of their attacks and abilities deal @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Boss.2:TrueDamagePercentage*100@% of damage as true damage.
items.name: The Boss

items.desc:
After each player combat, a random 1, 2 or 3 cost champion that usually fits your team is added to your bench for free.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Yordle.1:MinUnits@) Gain champions!
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Yordle.2:MinUnits@) If you have @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Yordle.2:NumOfThreeStarsNeeded@ or more 3 star champions, you instead gain a Yordle-Lord.
items.name: Yordle

items.desc:
Combat start: random enemies have their Health reduced.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Phantom.1:MinUnits@) Set @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Phantom.1:NumUnitsToReduce@ enemy's Health to @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Phantom.1:PercentHealth*100@% maximum Health.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Phantom.2:MinUnits@) Set @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Phantom.2:NumUnitsToReduce@ enemies' Health to @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Phantom.2:FlatHealth@.
items.name: Phantom

items.desc:
When an allied champion dies, a Doppelhellion (a one less star copy) equipped with a Red Buff will leap from the Hellion portal and join the fight!

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Hellion.1:MinUnits@) The first @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Hellion.1:NumOfUnits@ champions
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Hellion.2:MinUnits@) The first @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Hellion.2:NumOfUnits@ champions
items.name: Hellion

items.desc: Attacks grant Kayle @ASAmt*100@% stacking Attack Speed.
items.name: Scroll of Haste

items.desc: Kayle's Ability hits a wider area and deals @APAmt*100@% more damage.
items.name: Scroll of Force

items.desc: Kayle's damaging attacks and abilities @ResistPercent*100@% <TFTKeyword>Shred</TFTKeyword> and <TFTKeyword>Sunder</TFTKeyword> enemies hit for @Duration@ seconds.
items.name: Talisman of Aid

items.desc:
Your team's attacks and Abilities mark enemies. The mark stores a percentage of damage dealt to the enemy.

Marked enemies are struck by a cannonball after @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Bilgewater.1:BarrageInterval@ seconds, dealing the stored damage plus a flat value as physical damage.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Bilgewater.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Bilgewater.1:Damage@ + @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Bilgewater.1:DamagePercent@% damage dealt
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Bilgewater.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Bilgewater.2:Damage@ + @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Bilgewater.2:DamagePercent@% damage dealt. Every @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Bilgewater.2:ShotsUntilTreasure@th cannonball is replaced with a treasure chest that drops gold!
items.name: Bilgewater

items.desc:
Your team heals for a percent of their Max Health every @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Preserver.1:Duration@ seconds. If they are full Health, restore Mana instead.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Preserver.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Preserver.1:HealthPct*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, or @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Preserver.1:ManaPct*100@% %i:scaleMana%.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Preserver.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Preserver.2:HealthPct*100@% %i:scaleHealth%, and @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Preserver.2:ManaPct*100@% %i:scaleMana%. Always get both.
items.name: Preserver

items.desc:
Gain a Sevika's Jinxed Arm!

Combat start: roll a random Jinx mod. Roll another one:
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller.1:MinUnits@) after @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller.1:RollingFrequency@ seconds.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller.2:MinUnits@) every @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller.2:RollingFrequency@ seconds. Mods are stronger, and the holder can now hit a Jinxed Jackpot!

Mods:
- Rocket: Launch rockets at random enemies.
- Shield: Gain a shield for @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller.1:Spell2ShieldDuration@ seconds.
- Coin: Gain gold.

Rockets Fired: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller_RocketsFired@
Shields Gained: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller_ShieldsGained@
Gold Gained: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller_GoldGained@
Jackpots Hit: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFTEvent5YR_HighRoller_JackpotsHit@
items.name: High Roller

items.desc:
Once per combat at 60% Health, become The Boss and leave combat to start doing sit-ups. Each sit-up restores @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFTEvent5YR_Boss_HealPercent@% max Health and grants @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFTEvent5YR_Boss_AttackSpeedPercent@% Attack Speed. If all allies die, The Boss will immediately return to combat.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
items.name: Boss Knuckles

items.desc:
After combat, the 3 champions closest to Nomsy feed her 1 Snax per star level, adding Health and Ability Power. Nomsy's star level increases every 25 Snax!

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Trainer.1:MinUnits@) Summon Nomsy!
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Trainer.2:MinUnits@) Nomsy's Ability deals @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Trainer.2:DamageInc*100@% bonus damage
items.name: Trainer

items.desc:
Combat start: select champions Ascend and gain @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shurima.1:BonusHealthPercent*100@% maximum Health %i:scaleHealth% and @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shurima.1:BonusASPercent*100@% Attack Speed %i:scaleAS%.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shurima.1:MinUnits@) The strongest champion Ascends after @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shurima.1:SecondsToAscend@ seconds.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shurima.2:MinUnits@) The @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Shurima.2:NumUnitsToAscend@ strongest champions Ascend immediately.
items.name: Shurima

items.desc:
Nomsy needs to eat this many more Snax to level up!

[This does not count as an item.]
items.name: Delicious Snax

items.desc:
Gain %i:scaleAD% @AttackDamagePerGold@% Attack Damage per %i:goldCoins% gold in your bank (up to %i:goldCoins% @AttackDamageGoldLimit@ gold).

Attacks grant @StacksPerAttack@ stack, up to @CashoutStacks@ times. At full stacks, grant %i:goldCoins% @CashoutGold@ gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Gold generated this game: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Item_GoldGenerated@
items.name: Draven's Axe

items.desc:
Combat start: select champions gain @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Imperial.1:DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Imperial.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Imperial.1:NumOfUnits@ random champions.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Imperial.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Imperial.2:NumOfUnits@ random champions.
items.name: Imperial

items.desc:
The unit nearest to the center of your team is chosen as the Coven Leader, gaining bonus Ability Power.

Whenever your team casts an Ability, the Coven Leader gains Mana.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Coven.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Coven.1:AbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP%, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Coven.1:ManaToGive@ %i:scaleMana%
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Coven.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Coven.2:AbilityPower@ %i:scaleAP%, @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_Coven.2:ManaToGive@ %i:scaleMana%
items.name: Coven

items.desc:
Every @SecondsForEmpoweredAttack@ seconds, the next attack deals @AttackGoldMultiplier@x the amount of %i:goldCoins% gold in your bank in true damage.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
This does no damage if you have 0 gold.
items.name: Crown Of Champions

items.desc:
Your team gains laser drones. When a unit attacks or is hit by an attack, their drone deals magic damage to the target (@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_LaserCorps.1:ICD@ second cooldown). Drones are reassigned to another ally on death.

(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_LaserCorps.1:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_LaserCorps.1:MagicDamage@ magic damage.
(@TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_LaserCorps.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFTEvent5YR_LaserCorps.2:MagicDamage@ magic damage. All units gain an additional drone.
items.name: LaserCorps

items.desc:
Prevents the holder's first death. When they revive after 2 seconds, they shed all negative effects and gain @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Event_SF_SoulCrownHealthRestore@ Health (double your Soul Power).

Contribute +1 to the last listed Trait. (Unique traits excluded.)

[Cannot be used on champions in combat.]
[Unlimited uses.]
items.name: Soul Crown

items.desc:
Contribute +1 to the last listed Trait. (Unique traits excluded.)

A new effect unlocks at the start of the tournament (4-1).

[Cannot be used on champions in combat.]
[Unlimited uses.]
items.name: Imperfect Soul Crown

items.desc: Regenerate @MissingHealthHeal*100@% of missing Health each second.
items.name: Spirit Visage

items.desc:
Combat start: Grant the holder and allies within @HexRange@ hexes in the same row immunity to crowd control and @BuffAttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed for @Duration@ seconds.

[Support item] [Unique - only 1 per champion]
items.name: Banshee's Veil

items.desc:
Combat Start: Leap to the enemy backline.

Damage from an Ability can critically strike.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
items.name: Choncc's Prowler's Claw

items.desc:
Passive: On attack, deal @ModifiedPassiveCloneDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to a nearby enemy.

Active: Strike swiftly, sending @ModifiedNumClones@ (%i:scaleAS%) afterimages to the nearest @NumEnemies@ enemies. Each deals @ModifiedCloneDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and reduces armor by @ModifiedArmorShred@ (%i:scaleAP%).
items.name: Duelist Stance

items.desc: Briefly gain <scaleLevel>@WindowedDR*100@%</scaleLevel> Durability, then deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedInitialDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the target,  <physicalDamage>@ModifiedFinalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to all enemies behind the target, and <physicalDamage>@ModifiedAllEnemiesDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to other enemies in a 2-hex radius.
items.name: Juggernaut Stance

items.desc:
Deal @ModifiedStrikeDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to the lowest Health enemy within @HexRange@ hexes and Stun them for @StunDuration@ seconds. Other enemies in a 1-hex radius take @ModifiedAOEDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

After @NumKills@ kills with this ability all enemies instantly take @ModifiedShockwaveDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and are Stunned for @KillStunDuration@ seconds.
items.name: Executioner Stance

items.desc: Closes the Armory. Will reopen next round with new traits.
